body_html:
Hi @liuliu66 ,

you can check that information in https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/tree/master/caffe2/python/helpers
There you can find all arguments of the available layers in the brew python API. For example, look for "def conv" in the conv.py file and you will find the parameters needed for conv.

I haven't found any documentation in a catalogue style for the python API.

body:
Hi @liuliu66 ,

you can check that information in https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/tree/master/caffe2/python/helpers
There you can find all arguments of the available layers in the brew python API. For example, look for "def conv" in the conv.py file and you will find the parameters needed for conv. 

I haven't found any documentation in a catalogue style for the python API.
